attributes.title: you gotta go
attributes.review: it wouldn’t let me rate this app without downloading it first & from what i’ve read it takes days to download and then crashes your phone. So think twice before wasting your storage and time cus ain’t nobody got time for that . anyway so i clicked download , gave it 1 star then stopped the download . why do that you ask ? let me tell you . our annoying orange of a president is getting big mad over a little app . imagine a 75 YEAR OLD CHILD MOLESTER 🤢taking away our pride and joy 🥺called tik tok . if you don’t have it you should go download it and give it 5 stars 😌 . anyways back to the story . not only does our president not care about anyone other than whites he’s taking away an app that mostly used by whites . that’s just crazy . yes we say what we wanna say about whoever on that app because last time i checked it was a free country 👨. i’m just saying .. if you dont care about this country’s people why even become president . & then on top of that try to ban the rule of serving more than 2 terms . you could just leave office or wait till your sentence runs out . ✋ but cmon guys . just rate this app as low as possible and give it the worst review . the apple store will delete it for having such low rates 😊. but in all seriousness the man is 74 ..with luck he’s one foot in the grave .. then he won’t be a problem anymore . 😈oh and remember them kids that was arrested for trying to assassinate him ? open that cell let that boy out jail 🎶. anyways to hell with trump, his app, his supporters, his failed attempt at presidency and his soon to be failed attempts at ruining our lives 🙃. adios muchachos 😘

attributes.title: Just UNACCEPTABLE
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to learn more about the president. I learned nothing, all I saw was a Oompa Loompa looking old man. It is a disgrace in God’s eyes. Once going onto the app it takes thirty nine hours to download, an average app takes three to five minutes to download. But I guess this is a different case since there is a Oompa Loompa old man, once you open the app on the 46 try. Once finally loaded and could be opened. It took forty six different tries to open. Approximately what took twenty five minutes out of my day. In so many attempts, I felt frustrated, that I wanted to quit and delete the app, but no, I had determination to learn about the President that could be potentially running America for the next four years. That turned out to be disappointment, the disappointment you feel once someone fails you, the promises that they have made, but did not try to even put in action, and only made the situation worse. So after opening the app, it felt weird and suspicious, but I decided for first time to ignore my gut instincts and take the risk that a orange looking potato could track my information. That was horrible decision on part. Downloading the entire was one of the worst decisions I have made in my entire life. To have a disgrace be on my home screen was a terrible decision itself. Truly, I wanted to learn about the president through an app made by the president, but I was mistaken. And now I am getting random and suspicious calls from other cities that could possibly want my information and to torture and not treat me like the human being I am. This app should be taken down and no other person should ever feel unsafe that there information could be taken and used to capture you and be treated like a nobody. I have never written a review for an app at all. I have downloaded many apps that I dislike, but that was my fault. But this time, it was not my fault, it was me wanting to educate myself on current situation, then just sit there and assume and be wrong and continue to be ignorant. So I decided to take it upon myself and learn, and I regret deeply.
